meanings.definition: A person who institutes legal proceedings against someone.
meanings.sent1: The prosecutors presented their case in court.
meanings.sent2: The prosecutors worked hard to seek justice for the victim.
meanings.sent3: The prosecutors and defense attorney had a friendly chat during the break.
meanings.sent4: The prosecutors were like knights fighting for the truth in the courtroom.
meanings.sent5: The image of the prosecutors standing confidently left a lasting impression on the jury.

meanings.definition: A government official who conducts criminal proceedings on behalf of the state.
meanings.sent1: The prosecutors filed charges against the suspect.
meanings.sent2: The prosecutors are responsible for upholding the law in society.
meanings.sent3: The prosecutors organized a fun team-building event for the office.
meanings.sent4: The prosecutors' dedication to justice shone brightly in their work.
meanings.sent5: The prosecutors' determination to serve the community was evident in every case they handled.
